submission:
class Solution:
    def maxOperations(self, s: str) -> int:
        t = 0
        ans = 0
        n = len(s)
        # i = 0
        # while i < n:
        #     z = i
        #     while z < len(s) and s[z] == "0":
        #         z += 1
        #     if z < len(s) and s[z] == "1":
        #         ans += t
        #     i = z
        f = False
        for i in s:
            if i == "1":
                if f:  # 1不连续
                    ans += t
                t += 1  # 1的个数
                f = False
            else:
                f = True
                continue
        if i == "0":
            if f:  # 1不连续
                ans += t
            t += 1  # 1的个数
            f = False
        return ans
